sentence.text: Hypermethylated in cancer 1 (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II) is frequently deleted or epigenetically silenced in various human cancers.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The results provide evidence that lncRNA-numb is a newly proposed tumor suppressor that is involved in negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-induced phenotypes.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
